text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ―Umanest, a kingdom of swords and magic

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The fastest speeders in this world are not direwolves or wyverns.

Buggoo, buggoo, buggooooooooo! (Stupid! 
They're chasing us at this speed?)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wooooooooooo! Thieving orcs, wait, wait, wait!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: …… I'm catching up, Elle. ―This is the place to set it up!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Sue, glass! Haaaa! Condor onslaught wave: ！！！！！！！！！
―few hours ago, back in the day.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Introducing! VR Umarator!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
VR…… umalator? Ms. Chancellor, what are these three iron 
coffin-like machines?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Let me explain. VR Umarator" is a racing simulator developed for 
the Uma Musume of Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Turf, dirt, good ba field, heavy ba field. It's possible to 
reproduce any race course in any conditions.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it's so convenient to be able to 
reproduce all kinds of conditions.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Meh, it's a simulator. I thought it was a nap pod just for me.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
In addition, you can connect to various affiliated online games 
and play as Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
With this feature, you can send your beloved 
Uma Musume into magical lands, science fiction, 
cyberpunk, and everything in between!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
I am very happy to hear from you, Ms. Chairman…… I was opposed to 
that function, saying that it was impossible in many ways. ……

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Still, you were prepared for trouble and implemented it. ……

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I did this to spread the word about 
how wonderful Uma Musume is! The money in my 
pocket will never come back! I'm on fire!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh wow, not only can you run, but you 
can play games! That's just perfect!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh? I see one plane is already in motion. Who's that over there?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
On behalf of the school, I asked Ms. Symbol Rudolf, 
the president of the school, to run a test run first. 
We didn't want to have any problems.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Way to go, Chairman! Hey, Chairman of the Board, Chairman of the 
Board, Elle also has that machine ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What, what is this alarm!
EMERGENCY, EMERGENCY. Overall program error caused by Unit 1.

It is necessary to assign to the same session from 
Units 2 and 3 and release the session. If it cannot 
be released, all software must be reset.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: All software reset! No!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
If that happens, we'll have to redo the 
whole setup.…… What happened to Unit 1!
Ha, ha…… ha, ha ……

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The chairman seems to keep running very normally. ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, this is a world device! No, it's a crisis!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Okay, I'll go! If everyone is in trouble, Elle will go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Sturdy, robust, and the strongest of all! It won't be shaken by 
the slightest trouble!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: If so - I'll be there.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to machine trouble, Elle may not be able to handle 
it alone. As an assistant at that time.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Well, what a great duo! Then I'll leave it to these two 
well-meaning people!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Please do not get hurt. Let's go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, the…… start button is this one. If you press this, you 
will be in running mode. ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What, this is not a running mode! The same session is…… Huh?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, yeah! Glass, what is the meaning of this? This place! 
And what's with the outfit?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: This is…… apparently a fantasy game world. Another mode activated?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Fantasy…… Is this outfit of Elle's…… 
possibly a martial artist desu?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I seem to be a healer. Let's see, ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You can also see the status. This 
is definitely a fantasy game mode.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But why? It's supposed to go into the same 
running mode as the first unit. ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
There must be a reason! Something that is happening in this world 
that needs to be solved!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yale. You just want to explore this world, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But as long as they were brought here by the program, there may 
be a reason they are close. ……
(Zawazawa Zawazawa ……)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ah, someone has gathered! Could it be another player?

Hey, hey, what's with that race! Are they long-eared but…… elves! 
A war wolf with a fluffy tail?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: No, we are not! We are the Horse Girls!

What? Umamusume is…… that Umamusume? The real Uma Musume is in 
the game world?…… This is going to be great!

Oh, oh, oh, Uma Musume ……! I knew the legend was true! This may 
be salvation from the heavens.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That…… grandmother? What is legendary is ……

When the world is at stake―there is a saying here on the 
continent of Umanesto that goes something like this.

The "Attendant of the Phantom has descended. "The demonic 
spirits descend from the clouds to look down on the world 
below, and with their innate thunderbolt, bring destruction and 
pleasure to the Demon Lord."

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Phantom眷…… Are you referring to Uma 
Musume? I'm more interested in ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: The Demon King! Is there a Demon King in this world?

Indeed. Just the other day, she suddenly appeared in this world. 
Many heroes have been defeated by the Demon King, and the world 
is in the midst of a crisis.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno! Did you hear that, Glass? It is no accident that Elle and 
her friends came here!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That demon king is the source of all the trouble! 
Even if a normal race can't stop her, an Uma 
Musume can! That's why I've been called!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Is it a kind of bug mastery? Does the fact that there is lore 
mean that…… Uma Musume is somehow the key?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's what I'm talking about! If we defeat the Demon King, I'm 
sure our troubles will be solved!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Okay, let's embark on a journey of adventure, 
combat, and triumph! Let's defeat the Demon 
King, and save the world along the way!
